title: Sienna Rose: AI suspicions surround mysterious singer
description: She has millions of Spotify listeners, but fans don't know what to believe about whether she's real.
content:
Sienna Rose is having a good month.
Three of her dusky, jazz-infused soul songs are in Spotify's Viral Top 50. The most popular, a dreamy ballad called Into The Blue, has been played more than five million times.
If she continues on this trajectory, ... [6225 chars]

title: Trump's proposed credit card cap spotlights Americans' debt. Would it help?
description: President Trump's proposal to cap credit card interest rates at 10% - an idea with bipartisan support - received swift backlash from bank executives.
content:
Credit card debt is an increasingly heavy burden for millions of Americans.
Selena Cooper, 26, is among those dealing with the strain. A former paralegal at the Social Security Administration, she was left without a stable income when the US governme... [5034 chars]

title: Fibremaxxing: Trend for eating more fibre has surprising benefits
description: Fibre is making a comeback and this is a wellbeing trend nutritionists are getting excited about.
content:
Last year, many of us went protein-mad in the hopes of boosting our strength and fitness. But over the past few months, fibre has become the hot topic on social media - with only 4% of us getting the recommended daily amount.
Videos of people sprinkl... [5697 chars]

title: Paracetamol is safe in pregnancy, says new evidence against Trump autism claims
description: Researchers say their gold-standard review should put an end to the debate over use of the common painkiller during pregnancy.
content:
Taking paracetamol while pregnant is safe and there's no evidence it raises the risk of autism, ADHD and developmental issues in children, say experts behind a major new review.
Pregnant women "should feel reassured" by the findings, they say, which ... [5048 chars]

title: Blair and Rubio among names on Gaza 'Board of Peace'
description: The former UK prime minister and US secretary of state will sit on the "founding executive board", the White House says.
content:
The Trump administration has named US Secretary of State Marco Rubio and former UK prime minister Sir Tony Blair as two of the founding members of its "Board of Peace" for Gaza.
